title: Bug 15899 - Close All Saved does not work consistently
description: The Close All Saved feature is not functioning as expected.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu results in nothing happening.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting 'Close All Saved' should close the file, as no changes have been made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Go to the file menu.
4. Select 'Close All Saved'.
5. Observe that nothing happens when it should close the file.
